name: 997th Lord Commander
tweet: If you want to be applauded by Slaphappy fandom, insult Buhari and call him a failure. However, if you want to be undermined to the level of calling you an illiterate, support some of Buhari's policies – even if you're a highbrow. That's the true reality of the Nigerian state.
